entries.name: Age
entries: Celestials are effectively ageless while manifest.

entries.name: Celestial Knowledge
entries: You have proficiency in the History and Religion skills.

entries.name: Radiant-Born
entries: You are immune to radiant damage.

entries.name: Sacrificial Healing
entries: As a bonus action you may lose hit points to heal a willing creature you can see: roll 1d4 + your Wisdom modifier; you lose that many hit points and the ally regains that many. Usable once per short or long rest. Die scales at levels 5 / 10 / 15 per DM.

entries.name: Sacrificial Shielding
entries: When a creature you can see within 30 feet takes damage, you may use your reaction to take half that damage instead. Usable once per short or long rest.
